title: Toxic players be like...
body:
"WtF rIoT i SpEnT mOnIeS nAo Am BaNnEd I sHuLdNt HeV tO fOlLoW rOoLz Am EnTitUld!!!111"

Like, context doesn't matter, no one else knows if you're "kidding", and responding to toxicity with toxicity doesn't make it right.

Oh, and the mute button isn't an excuse for you to be toxic.

replies.body: I personally downvoted because this thread isn't constructive at all.  As a matter of fact it's the opposite.  It's only mocking people with a strong holier than thou air about it

> [{quoted}](name=Eedat,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6fVauHOJ,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2019-04-22T20:58:59.941+0000)
>
> I personally downvoted because this thread isn't constructive at all.  As a matter of fact it's the opposite.  It's only mocking people with a strong holier than thou air about it

im not saying it is, but it's a thread that was up for 30 minutes and had over 20 downvotes with no comments
Well yeah the botting is real but I was just clarifying that it wasn't all a bot

> [{quoted}](name=DartExplosion10,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6fVauHOJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-04-22T19:37:36.999+0000)
>
> bots at it again

I don't mind this type of unconstructive, non-discussion post being downvoted -- even to this amount, but i can't deny it's getting downvote botted

Yikes, those are some nasty downvotes you have there.

Not surprising, since most of the population of boards are dysfunctional manchildren who just got banned, taking a breather before their next ban.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6fVauHOJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-04-22T20:08:20.308+0000)
>
> Yikes, those are some nasty downvotes you have there.
> 
> Not surprising, since most of the population of boards are dysfunctional manchildren who just got banned, taking a breather before their next ban.

Irony?
And with that comment you may surpass that.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
It's the bots at it again, it was a 0 votes and then 1 minute later at -15. For a while I thought the bots were gone, but I guess they make us miss them.
No, I'm playing aram as we speak lmao

I wish Jesus threw a massive boulder at you that crushed your spinal cord JK bro.

But for real the Holiur Then Thou attitude on this community is cancerous.
